title: Creating an Equation
text: The small angles of a right triangle add to 90. $$x+y=90$$. From the problem, we also know that $$x-3y=14$$.

title: Elimination
text: We can multiply the first equation by 3 to get $$3x+3y=270$$. Now, we add the equations to eliminate y. $$4x=284$$

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{284}{4}=71$$. Plugging x back into the equation, we get $$y=90-71=19$$.
